resources.string: LinguaAmharic is a free Amharic language learning android application for designed for English speakers.\n \nAmharic,the official working language of Ethiopia along with English, is spoken by around 26 million people.

This version provides translations for 574 phrases and words in 13 categories with clickable audio.

Usage Variations in gender and singular vs plural addressing is indicated next to each English word. 

Category search is supported.

This version supports Android phones only.
I would love to hear your feedback!
